           Search Credo's Online Reference Materials

          <div id="boxatt10243137" class="boxatt">
           <script type="text/javascript" src="/js112/credo_search_box.js">
            &lt;script type="text/javascript"&gt;
                        var CS_10243137;
           </script>
           <style>
            #credo_search_content_10243137 { font-family: Arial; }
                        .credo_search_button {
                            color: white;
                            background-color: #B3B0D4;
                            border: 1px solid #888;
                            font-weight: bolder;

           <div id="credo_search_box_10243137">
            <div>
             <label for="searchText10243137">
              <img src="//search.credoreference.com/images/app/school_search/credo_logo.20d565f9.png" alt="Credo Reference Search" />
             </label>
            </div>
            <div style="padding-top: 5px;">
             <form name="frm_credo_search_10243137" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;" onsubmit="return false;">
              <input name="txt_credo_search10243137" id="txt_credo_search10243137" type="text" style="width: 125px;" onkeypress="function submitCSSearch(e){var evtobj=window.event?event:e;var keycode=evtobj.keyCode;if (keycode == 13) {CS_10243137.Search();}}submitCSSearch(event);" value="" />

            </div>

           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10101170" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />

           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10101170').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>

          <h2>
           Class Guides
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16744627">
          <div id="boxatt16744627" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19778389">
              <a id="link_19778389" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/envsci2" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19778389,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19778389}); ">

              </a>

              </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10243150">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10243150">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10243150">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10243150">
          <div id="boxatt10243150" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12455967">
              <a id="link_12455967" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.sciencedirect.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12455967,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286439}); ">
               Science Direct, Health, Life, and Physical Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of 1000+ full-text Elsevier journals in the areas of health, life, and physical sciences from 1995 to the present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12455968">
              <a id="link_12455968" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.springerlink.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12455968,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286445}); ">
               Springerlink
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Over 1,700 journals from Springer-Verlag with coverage from 1997 to present. Subjects covered focus on the natural sciences, but also include significant titles in behavioral sciences, humanities, social sciences and law.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12455970">
              <a id="link_12455970" href="https://scifinder.cas.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12455970,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12325164}); ">
               SciFinder
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database and research tool including literature from many scientific disciplines, specifically in chemistry, engineering, and materials science. **Patrons must register
               <a href="https://origin-scifinder.cas.org/registration/index.html?corpKey=EAED9FB1-86F3-50AB-4A5D-9970D02A6395">
                here
               </a>
               and are required to have a muhlenberg e-mail address to use this database.**
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12455974">
              <a id="link_12455974" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://pubs.acs.org/action/showPublications?display=journals" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12455974,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12325172}); ">
               American Chemical Society Web Editions
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Abstracts and some full-text of peer-reviewed research journals in the chemical and related sciences
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12455979">
              <a id="link_12455979" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12455979,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286581}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12455982">
              <a id="link_12455982" href="http://agricola.nal.usda.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12455982,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12455982}); ">
               AGRICOLA
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of citations to scientific literature primarily focusing on agriculture (including books, articles, and online resources) created by the National Agriculture Library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12833605">
              <a id="link_12833605" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=8gh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12833605,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12833605}); ">
               GreenFile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               GreenFile's resources focus on the ways humans affect the environment, providing indexing and some full text of scholarly and general interest items.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10243199">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10243199">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10243199">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           News sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10100926">
          <div id="boxatt10100926" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12286621">
              <a id="link_12286621" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12286621,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286621}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24778156">
              <a id="link_24778156" href="http://www.nytimes.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24778156,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23576209}); ">
               New York Times
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Complete access to New York Times via Muhlenberg subscription. All users must register while physically on campus, using their Muhlenberg email.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12286628">
              <a id="link_12286628" href="http://www.sciencedaily.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12286628,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286628}); ">
               Science Daily
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               News articles, videos, and images in the subjects of health, math, and the sciences.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24778157">
              <a id="link_24778157" href="http://news.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24778157,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Science', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19776525}); ">
               Google news
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Aggregated news from worldwide sources
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2920722" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
